articles.description: With three households able to mix from December 23 to 27, the Queen and Prince Philip have plenty of options with four children and eight grandchildren and the same great-grandchildren
articles.content:
The Queen's royal Christmas will be a very different affair this year.
Traditionally, the royal family descend en masse to the Sandringham estate for a festive stay with the monarch.
